definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: He turned northeast and crossed the firmer sand towards the Pigeonhouse.
sentences.chinese: 他拐向東北，從硬一些的沙地穿過，朝鴿房走去。

sentences.english: He lofted his pigeons on the roof.
sentences.chinese: 他把鴿子養在屋頂鴿房裏。

sentences.english: Who are these who fly like a cloud and like the doves to their dovecote ?
sentences.chinese: 那些如雲飛來，又如鴿子飛回鴿房的，是誰呢？
